name: The Journey Down: Chapter Three
description: The final chapter of The Journey Down, a classic point-and-click saga with an Afro-Caribbean vibe. Get ready to embark on an epic journey of brain-teasing adventure!
minimum_requirements: 最低配置: 操作系统: Windows XP SP 2+, Windows Vista, Windows 7 处理器: 1.8 GHz CPU 内存: 1 GB RAM 图形: Direct X 9.0c compatible video card DirectX 版本: 9.0 存储空间: 需要 1500 MB 可用空间
